## Project Overview
**Please only fill out this ticket template if your team is ready to begin the work**

* Epic Ticket Link:
* Requester / Team:
* PO's Name & Email:
* Team Points of Contact for Eng, UX, PM, etc. (FYI we will invite these individuals to the kickoff meeting):
* Is this feature/experience already on VA.gov?
* Is your team currently making or planning changes to the web experience related to this feature?

## Project Goals and Alignment

* Link to Product Brief:

**OR**

* Problem Statement:
* Describe the high-level goals for this initiative:
* Acceptance Criteria:

## Relevant Documentation

* Research summaries:
* Current web flows or prototypes:
* Github folder, related PRs, past app tickets:
* Any other helpful details:

<!-- The rest of these steps drive the conversation that will take place in the kickoff meeting, do not feel required to supply this info in advance

## Feature Context

* Is this iteration on an existing feature or a net-new feature for the app?
* Is there a hard deadline associated with this request? If so:
    * Why this particular deadline?
    * Potential impacts to the app or other services if the deadline is not met

## Dependencies & Constraints

* Any known net-new design inclusions required? (New screen component, process, etc)
* Where in the app do you envision this feature?
* What APIs support this feature?

## Testing Needs

* Any specific accessibility considerations to account for?
* What test user requirements will exist to test this feature?
* Do staging users exist that fit the required criteria for testing or can they be updated?
* Other staging data requirements?

## Analytics

* Are there pre-existing analytics for the web or the app?
* Anticipated analytics to include?
* How will we measure success for the feature?

## App Interactions

* Navigation:
* Notifications:
* Profile:
* Homescreen Activities:
* Other feature implications(Appts, Claims, Secure messaging, etc):

## Next Steps

* Any additional requirements for kickoff approval?
* Any other additional task assignments for experience team members or MAP team member?
